thread.title: Film with Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt isn’t typical love story: Gauri Shinde
thread.title_full: Film with Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt isn’t typical love story: Gauri Shinde

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Film with Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt isn’t typical love story: Gauri Shinde
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 11 (CINEWS): Gauri Shinde’s film got features after Karan Johar declared that the film will star Shah Rukh Khan alongside Alia Bhatt. 
Grapevines were buzz where the vast majority called it one of the biggest furthermore wierdest casting coups ever. SRK and Alia romancing one another? Doesn’t appear to be fascinating, given the age gap between the two performers. 
Gauri Shinde who’s kept mum on the point at last ended her silence and gave us a knowledge into what the film may be about. “Everything I can say is that the film isn’t a run of the mill love story. It’s not around a romantic relationship in the standard way that a man and a lady offer.” 
Why Alia? “I am upbeat to have cast her. I am somewhat exceptionally satisfied with the casting. It’s an alternate story without a doubt so all of you will get the opportunity to see it soon.” But Alia as of late admitted that she’s scared by SRK’s vicinity. “That is awesome for her. She must be intimidated. We all ought to be intimidated by one another,” Gauri ignores it. 
The film which has ‘still not been named’ will go on floors in November this year. Related Posts
